programme.title: The King of Fighters
Kralj boraca
programme.desc:
The King of Fighters: Directed by Gordon Chan. With Maggie Q, Sean Faris, Will Yun Lee, Ray Park. Live-action feature based on the video game "King of Fighters"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1038685/","name":"The King of Fighters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2OTU3ODYwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE2NjI2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Live-action feature based on the video game "King of Fighters".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1038685/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shingo_1982"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"What have kof become in the hands of those moron?","reviewBody":"If you are a Kof player, do not watch this. 

If you are into action/fighting movie, do not watch this. 

If you love watching good movie, Do Not Watch This.

I really have no idea why they made such a movie? 

Was Dragonball no bad enough?? Have they no learn the mistake?? 

What is the director or the screen writer thinking?? Iori Yagami looks like a playboy?? Kyo is American Spanish?? (can't really tell what nationality he is, but he sure is not the Kyo we are expecting), maggie Q as Mai? And who is that guy using the 2 sticks? Rugal?? not Mr.Big??? No to mention the other characters, i am really speechless.

This is not X-Men, or Spider Man, or one of those American superhero story, which was successfully turned into movie. 

This Is Kof. You simply just can not find a bunch of people, film some really bad fighting scenes, slap a movie together and call it Kof.

Sorry about the complain, but I had to hold my anger for 1 and half hour, just so i can see it to the end, and be sure how hopeless this movie is before i made this post. 

I wanted to give this a 0 star rating, but the lowest is 1 so yeah.

It's bad.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4242,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-08-26","keywords":"woman fights a man,female fighter,thigh high boots,garter belt,man punches a woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The King of Fighters","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1945869337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQxODczY2MtOGU3My00NDg4LTk2OTktOWJmODk0NTg2OTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQxODczY2MtOGU3My00NDg4LTk2OTktOWJmODk0NTg2OTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The King Of Fighters"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702572/","name":"Maggie Q"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267511/","name":"Sean Faris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498449/","name":"Will Yun Lee"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0150906/","name":"Gordon Chan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150666/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090191/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0294672/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3073015/","name":"Rita Augustine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159443/","name":"Chris Chow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3227459/","name":"Matthew Ryan Fischer"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Basic Instinct 2
Niske strasti 2
programme.desc:
Basic Instinct 2: Directed by Michael Caton-Jones. With Stan Collymore, Sharon Stone, Neil Maskell, David Thewlis. Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0430912/","name":"Basic Instinct 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNzM3ODY3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzMyNDcyNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0430912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ENRIQUE-3"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is now fashionable to trash "Basic Instinct 2" even before you see it.","reviewBody":"It seems that it is becoming fashionable to rip "Basic Instinct 2," to the point that a significant part of the audience (including critics) found it terrible even before it was released. It seems even more fashionable to trash Sharon Stone wholike all of usis now fourteen years older, andunlike most of usstill looks wonderful. First comments on this movie were so vicious that I had to see for myself. In my opinion, this sequel is not nearly as good as the original film, but is not as bad as most comments pretend. Michael Caton-Jones is not Paul Verhoeven, neither Henry Bean and Leora Barish are Joe Eszterhas. "Basic Instinct 2" is just an entertaining, average thriller, and besides the addition of Jerry Goldsmith original score, keeps little resemblance to its predecessor. Even Stone gives her character a different dimension, creating a lustful, devilish Catherine Trimell, who can perfectly well rank among other monsters like Hannibal Lecter. She is an intelligent actress who is not afraid of taking risks and can play with camp at her leisure. Unfortunately, she seems to be the main target for those who enjoy trashing this flick. She became too successful, too much of a main icon, and like all those actors who have reached that level, her time has arrived and she is now bound to be destroyed by Hollywood audiences.

The rest of the cast is outstanding, giving performances that are far better than the material deserves. David Morrissey is a much better actor and by far more interesting than Michael Douglas: his acting is flawless, giving a dense, complex dimension to an otherwise one dimensional character. Since he has more screen time and is the axis of the movie, he can keep your attention from beginning to end.

I am not recommending "Basic Instinct 2" as a great movie; I am just expressing my disagreement with most of the comments on this site and my conviction that agendas other than the movie itself are shaping the opinion of most spectators.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":38662,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-01-10","keywords":"narcissistic personality disorder,antisocial personality disorder,sex,consensual sex,female female kiss","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Basic Instinct 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi985202969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJmMTA5ZmUtOTRjMy00OGM2LTllNjEtNmI0YWJjMTE1YmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJmMTA5ZmUtOTRjMy00OGM2LTllNjEtNmI0YWJjMTE1YmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607375/","name":"David Morrissey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000667/","name":"David Thewlis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001994/","name":"Michael Caton-Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000390/","name":"Joe Eszterhas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054713/","name":"Leora Barish"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063785/","name":"Henry Bean"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: Kolekcija videobiografija najvećih holivudskih zvijezda. Emisija "Close Up" gledateljima pred malim ekranima donosi intervjue s najvećim hollywoodskim zvijezdama, ali i zanimljivosti vezane uz svijet filma. Uživajte uz zabavne i zanimljive minute ove biografske emisije!

programme.title: The Pallbearer
Nosač lijesa
programme.desc: The Pallbearer: Directed by Matt Reeves. With David Schwimmer, Gwyneth Paltrow, Michael Rapaport, Toni Collette. A young man's life is thrown into a loop when he is asked to be a pallbearer for the funeral of a classmate he doesn't remember, and his old high school crush temporarily returns to town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117283/","name":"The Pallbearer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MzJjOGItZWM4MC00ZTljLWI0NjktODFhNzYyNTdlMmY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young man's life is thrown into a loop when he is asked to be a pallbearer for the funeral of a classmate he doesn't remember, and his old high school crush temporarily returns to town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117283/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"budikavlan"},"dateCreated":"2003-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delicate soufflé of comedy and melancholy","reviewBody":"The tone of this film is really difficult to convey on paper. It manages to successfully capture the elusive appeal that David Schwimmer has from time to time; it's easy for his sad-sack personality to grow annoying and pathetic, but this script managed to walk that line. The scenes of embarrassment and shame never seem overdone or cheap, and serve the story well. I especially like the down-to-earth, realistic beauty that Gwyneth Paltrow always brings to a role; she never seems like a movie star playing a real person. Because of Schwimmer's brief tenure as a star with buzz, this was seen as a box office failure, but it was never the kind of movie likely to rake in huge bucks. For what it is, a small, thoughtful, offbeat romantic comedy, The Pallbearer is a winner.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1996-05-03","keywords":"dark humor,jewish wedding,prologue,scene during opening credits,pallbearer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pallbearer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3218120217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q3NmQzNDgtZGM3OC00ODIxLTkyYzUtOWFjZWE5MTM0ODhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q3NmQzNDgtZGM3OC00ODIxLTkyYzUtOWFjZWE5MTM0ODhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001710/","name":"David Schwimmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000569/","name":"Gwyneth Paltrow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001650/","name":"Michael Rapaport"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0716257/","name":"Matt Reeves"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0441300/","name":"Jason Katims"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0716257/","name":"Matt Reeves"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0117283, Title: The Pallbearer, --- Description: The Pallbearer: Directed by Matt Reeves. With David Schwimmer, Gwyneth Paltrow, Michael Rapaport, Toni Collette. A young man's life is thrown into a loop when he is asked to be a pallbearer for the funeral of a classmate he doesn't remember, and his old high school crush temporarily returns to town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117283/","name":"The Pallbearer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MzJjOGItZWM4MC00ZTljLWI0NjktODFhNzYyNTdlMmY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young man's life is thrown into a loop when he is asked to be a pallbearer for the funeral of a classmate he doesn't remember, and his old high school crush temporarily returns to town.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117283/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"budikavlan","dateCreated":"2003-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delicate soufflé of comedy and melancholy","reviewBody":"The tone of this film is really difficult to convey on paper. It manages to successfully capture the elusive appeal that David Schwimmer has from time to time; it's easy for his sad-sack personality to grow annoying and pathetic, but this script managed to walk that line. The scenes of embarrassment and shame never seem overdone or cheap, and serve the story well. I especially like the down-to-earth, realistic beauty that Gwyneth Paltrow always brings to a role; she never seems like a movie star playing a real person. Because of Schwimmer's brief tenure as a star with buzz, this was seen as a box office failure, but it was never the kind of movie likely to rake in huge bucks. For what it is, a small, thoughtful, offbeat romantic comedy, The Pallbearer is a winner.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1996-05-03","keywords":"dark humor,jewish wedding,prologue,scene during opening credits,pallbearer","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pallbearer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3218120217","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q3NmQzNDgtZGM3OC00ODIxLTkyYzUtOWFjZWE5MTM0ODhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q3NmQzNDgtZGM3OC00ODIxLTkyYzUtOWFjZWE5MTM0ODhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001710/","name":"David Schwimmer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000569/","name":"Gwyneth Paltrow","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001650/","name":"Michael Rapaport"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0716257/","name":"Matt Reeves"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037557/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0441300/","name":"Jason Katims","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0716257/","name":"Matt Reeves"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: She's All That
Ona je sve to
programme.desc: She's All That: Directed by Robert Iscove. With Freddie Prinze Jr., Rachael Leigh Cook, Matthew Lillard, Paul Walker. A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160862/","name":"She's All That","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Y0N2YyOTQtMGNiYy00ZDViLTgxYmItODkxNzlkMWVjNTFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160862/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":""I feel just like Julia Roberts in Pretty Woman. You know, except for the whole hooker thing."","reviewBody":"Silly but fun teen romantic comedy about a high school jock (Freddie Prinze, Jr.) who bets his friend (Paul Walker) that he can turn a geek (Rachael Leigh Cook) into the prom queen. Flimsy updating of Pygmalion is hard to hate. It doesn't take itself seriously in the least. Yeah it's absolutely ridiculous that Rachael Leigh Cook, an exceptionally pretty girl, would be considered unattractive just because she wears glasses and overalls. But you just roll with it because it's cute and fun. The cast is very likable and the script is good for this type of movie. Matthew Lillard steals pretty much every scene he's in. It's fluff but you'll be smiling when it's over. Can't see the harm in that.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":91238,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1999-01-29","keywords":"high school,teen comedy,teen movie,cinderella story,claim in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"She's All That","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi679323161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmZiYjg3ODQtZmM0YS00M2MyLTgwZmMtZTFkMTA1NDlhNmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmZiYjg3ODQtZmM0YS00M2MyLTgwZmMtZTFkMTA1NDlhNmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for She's All That"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005327/","name":"Freddie Prinze Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000337/","name":"Rachael Leigh Cook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000498/","name":"Matthew Lillard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410769/","name":"Robert Iscove"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018522/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159642/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281592/","name":"R. programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
Ace Ventura: Kad priroda zove
programme.desc: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls: Directed by Steve Oedekerk. With Jim Carrey, Ian McNeice, Simon Callow, Maynard Eziashi. Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112281/","name":"Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFiYTgxZDctNGI4OS00MWU1LWIwOGUtZmMyNGQxYjVkZjQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112281/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kikabeth"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Jim Carrey Love Him or Hate Him","reviewBody":"Jim Carrey is one of those actors you will find yourself either adoring or hating. He does not ever "underact." This movie made me laugh so hard I cried (even after the fifth time!) From the robot rhino scene to the monopoly guy Jim knows how to be hilarious. I saw the first one (liked it a lot) and have to say this one is way better! I am a huge fan of Carrey. I don't think there are many people who can make such a variety of facial expressions. The only reason this is not a ten is because there is (as usual with Carrey) some inappropriate stuff thrown in. But if your love laughing and you love Jim, this movie will fit you "Like a glove!"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":208452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1995-11-10","keywords":"kidnapping,caught masturbating,fictional country,slapstick comedy,cult film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi162857241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNDFhMjMtNzY4Yi00YmMzLWE3YTItMzk2YzgxM2JkYjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNDFhMjMtNzY4Yi00YmMzLWE3YTItMzk2YzgxM2JkYjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Warner Bros. programme.title: Ubijanje Eve
programme.desc: Eve je operativka sigurnosne službe. Veoma je pametna, dosadan joj je kancelarijski posao, i ne ispunjava njena maštanja o tome da postane špijun. Villanelle je otmjena, voli luksuz, koji joj pruža... Eve je operativka sigurnosne službe. Veoma je pametna, dosadan joj je kancelarijski posao, i ne ispunjava njena maštanja o tome da postane špijun. Villanelle je otmjena, voli luksuz, koji joj pruža njen muž, ali je i talentirana ubica... Ove dvije izrazito inteligentne žene, podjednako opsjednute jedna drugom, direktno se sukobljavaju u epskoj igri mačke i miša.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
Bilo jednom u Meksiku
programme.desc:
Once Upon a Time in Mexico: Directed by Robert Rodriguez. With Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Johnny Depp, Mickey Rourke. Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0285823/","name":"Once Upon a Time in Mexico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDg5OTcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjI1MTIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0285823/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sporadically enjoyable but the plot is a total shambles","reviewBody":"El Mariachi has long quit the gunslinger trade but is offered a chance to avenge the death of his wife and daughter by slightly unhinged CIA agent Sands. Sands is trying to control a coup by allowing it to happy but then having the victor killed as soon as he takes power. However the involvement of drug lord Barillo and various other groups soon complicate matters causing bullets to come from all sides.

After taking an unlikely trilogy to box office success, Rodriguez returns to the film series that basically brought him the success he has today  El Mariachi. While the first film in the series was a very cheap movie, the second and the third swelled with budget and star names. Here the action is constant and is very stylised. This is not to say that it is all edge of the seat stuff, but if spectacle and bangs is all you are after then this should do the job nicely. None of it moves slowly simply because it has more than enough going on to fill the time  but that's the problem to be honest.

The plot has so much going on but none of it actually fits together or makes a whole lot of sense. After a while any attempt to put things together in my head became a wasted effort  clearly the point here was that the style and gloss was meant to be everything. The other downside to this is that some characters are so poorly used that it's a wonder as to why they were even written in. Some cameos are fantastic and make the film. I refer to, of course, Depp, who, for the second time this summer, manages to make a film better by his sheer witty performance. He owes a lot to the writing of the character but he carries him off superbly and is darkly funny. However Rouke, Blades, Mendes, Dafoe all have little to do and, with some of them, are just clutter. Banderas does his usual stuff with style but his character doesn't have the depth that the flashbacks I think are meant to give him  again this is style over substance.

I still quite enjoyed the film but couldn't help but feel it was less the sum of it's parts. With a budget, big names and lots of action I was surprised that the cluttered, shambolic plot managed to take away from the `fun' as much as it did  but it did. Quite enjoyable but you need a LOT of style to win compensate for the total lack of substance."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":157279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-12-17","keywords":"mexico,bikini,outnumbered,mariachi,playing electric guitar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Once Upon a Time in Mexico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi813540889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkNzMzZjItZTllOS00MmMwLWJmYzYtOGFiMWVjODMyNjUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Once Upon a Time in Mexico"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035848/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zombieland
Dobro došli u zemlju zombija
programme.desc:
Zombieland: Directed by Ruben Fleischer. With Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Emma Stone, Abigail Breslin. A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1156398/","name":"Zombieland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDg0NTQ1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA4Mjg3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1156398/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akerdan"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Actually quite fun","reviewBody":"I just was exiting the theater after seeing '9', which is also worth a look, when my friend and I were offered tickets to a preview screening of Zombieland, which began almost immediately. I had seen previews for this picture, but I'd say this exceeded my expectations, which isn't to say masterpiece, but it was certainly entertaining, and at about 90 minutes, didn't really overstay it's welcome. 

As you might expect for this genre, it's quite gory, so don't go expecting a light 'R' rating. But if you can handle some bloodshed, no, make that a substantial amount of bloodshed - but perhaps I should add in a comic environment - there's some pretty funny stuff here. Woody Harreleson and Jesse Eisenberg make an amusing odd couple and Emma Stone was fine for this material, although she and Abigale Breslin had slightly less to do. 

I'm certainly no expert on the horror genre or the zombie sub-genre, but I can say that this wasn't as scary as Shaun of the Dead, in fact not very scary at all, I may have jumped back just a tiny bit a few times; however I may have laughed more. However I'm sure it does make a difference that I saw 'Shaun' alone on DVD, while 'Zombieland' I watched in a theater full of people laughing, clapping and cheering. 

Let's face it, you know what's going to happen in this flick, but I'm happy to say, plot conventions and all, this delivers enough laughs so if you know what you're getting into I doubt you'll regret laying down the price of admission for this sucker. Should you see it, see it opening night - if I haven't made it clear enough already, this is the kind of movie where the more enthusiastic people in the theater, the more fun it will be. And to end on a very positive note, 'Zombieland' does feature what just might go down in history as the best celebrity cameo of all time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":540788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-01-06","keywords":"zombie,amusement park,twinkie,on the road,actor playing himself","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The "Kick-Ass Girls" of Zombieland","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi179635481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Zombieland featurette"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251986/","name":"Jesse Eisenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1297015/","name":"Emma Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281508/","name":"Ruben Fleischer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Life of Brian
Brianov život
programme.desc:
Life of Brian: Directed by Terry Jones. With Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle. Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079470/","name":"Life of Brian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzAwNjU1OTktYjY3Mi00NDY5LWFlZWUtZjhjNGE0OTkwZDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079470/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ptpenry"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stunningly funny","reviewBody":"One of my fave films of all time, this film has so many laugh-out-loud jokes and ridiculous thought processes that it would probably be unfair to pick out just a few. Tough - I'm going to: John Cleese as the legionnary Latin teacher rebuking Brian not for daring to use graffiti on the Roman fort but for using the wrong tense, Michael Palin trying to find his place in life as an ex-leper, Terry Jones as Brian's mother trying to protect him from myrrh - let's face it, we've all wondered what myrrh is ! The bit that always makes me laugh without fail is something that isn't always noticed - when Michael Palin is having a go at the guards; "Do you find it risible when I say the name of my friend Biggus Diccus ?" if you look carefully you'll see that Palin is trying really hard not to laugh.

Puerile, silly but also very very clever. This film doesn't criticise religion or Jesus in any way ( what was wrong with the people who tried to ban it ? ) - it's just asking what it could have been like in a society that was expecting the Messiah to show up at any moment, and covering it in a massive coating of comedy.

This film is an absolute classic - 10 out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":381942,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1979-11-08","keywords":"satire,british comedy,monty python,reference to jesus christ,actor playing multiple roles","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3075522329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVhZDNmN2UtMWRkOC00Y2NlLWEyNjktYzE5OGRjNTZiZGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVhZDNmN2UtMWRkOC00Y2NlLWEyNjktYzE5OGRjNTZiZGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001037/","name":"Graham Chapman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000092/","name":"John Cleese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001589/","name":"Michael Palin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001402/","name":"Terry Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103514/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001037/","name":"Graham Chapman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000092/","name":"John Cleese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000416/","name":"Terry Gilliam"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Arrival
Dolazak
programme.desc: The Arrival: Directed by David Twohy. With Charlie Sheen, Lindsay Crouse, Richard Schiff, Shane. Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0115571/","name":"The Arrival","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI3OTg1NzItNDQxMS00MzY1LTkzODUtYjNkMmUzNTE0MWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDAxNjkxNjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0115571/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"merklekranz"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining but with plenty of flaws .......","reviewBody":"At least "The Arrival" doesn't fall into the car chases and gratuitous explosions category of sci-fi. It has some semblance of scientific reason, and some pretty original ideas. The vortex balls were an intriguing touch, and the gigantic satellite dish scenes quite effective. It is necessary to suspend disbelief on several occasions, but overall the film succeeds as entertainment. Having the kid along seemed like kind of a stretch as well. If you can look past the faults in logic, "The Arrival" is totally acceptable. If you are going to tear it apart for every little thing, then I suggest you look elsewhere. - MERK","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1996-05-31","keywords":"african american boy,black hole bomb,investigation,mexico,alien","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Arrival","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1988690201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJjNzBhZWMtMGU4Zi00NzYzLWE2ODItYjE2ODcxNDM5MTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJjNzBhZWMtMGU4Zi00NzYzLWE2ODItYjE2ODcxNDM5MTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000221/","name":"Charlie Sheen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001080/","name":"Lindsay Crouse"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068503/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022915/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
Dogodilo se na Manhattanu
programme.desc:
Maid in Manhattan: Directed by Wayne Wang. With Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson, Stanley Tucci. A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0252076/","name":"Maid in Manhattan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczODg2ODI2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODIxMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0252076/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ebiros2"},"dateCreated":"2011-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fantasy for a single mom ?","reviewBody":"Nice fantasy romance starring Jennifer Lopez that seems to rank high amongst her fans.

Marisa Ventura (Jennifer Lopez) is a single parent maid working at a high end hotel in Manhattan. She meets Chris (Ralph Finnes) a wealthy politician who finds her son cute and also falls for her head over heels, but he thinks she's also from a privileged background. Soon he finds out her true identity. Will her romance survive ?

This is a modern day Cinderella story. By no effort of her own, she goes from a maid to becoming affiliated with the highest echelon of the society. Coveted, desired and protected by a strong man who also likes her son and is very nice to him as well. It's an escapism, but it works. 

The opinions may be divided on this movie. Some may find the story too convenient. Other's may find the story a transporting experience for 100 minutes. One thing is for sure. If someone else played the lead, this movie would have been just a soap opera, but credit goes to Jennifer Lopez for turning a flop into a box office success. She brings quality to the movie that wouldn't deserve the class if she wasn't in it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":86774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-03-26","keywords":"1970s,beauty salon,hair salon,brooklyn new york city,ball gown","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Maid in Manhattan","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3935764761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0MmM2ZDgtMzg3YS00NzNiLWIxZGEtNzg3ODUzZmZmMTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0MmM2ZDgtMzg3YS00NzNiLWIxZGEtNzg3ODUzZmZmMTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000182/","name":"Jennifer Lopez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001670/","name":"Natasha Richardson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911061/","name":"Wayne Wang"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087432/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073707/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000455/","name":"John Hughes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905458/","name":"Kevin Wade"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ubijanje Eve
programme.desc: Eve je operativka sigurnosne službe. Veoma je pametna, dosadan joj je kancelarijski posao, i ne ispunjava njena maštanja o tome da postane špijun. Villanelle je otmjena, voli luksuz, koji joj pruža... Eve je operativka sigurnosne službe. Veoma je pametna, dosadan joj je kancelarijski posao, i ne ispunjava njena maštanja o tome da postane špijun. Villanelle je otmjena, voli luksuz, koji joj pruža njen muž, ali je i talentirana ubica... Ove dvije izrazito inteligentne žene, podjednako opsjednute jedna drugom, direktno se sukobljavaju u epskoj igri mačke i miša.

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

credits.actor: Kiefer Sutherland, Natascha McElhone, Adan Canto, Italia Ricci, LaMonica Garrett, Kal Penn, Maggie Q, Rob Morrow

programme.title: Škorpion
programme.desc: Dok tim "Škorpion" zabrinuto čeka presudu na temelju koje bi Cabe mogao završiti u zatvoru, usmjeravaju nervoznu energiju na spašavanje psa koji je zapeo u cisterni. Dok tim "Škorpion" zabrinuto čeka presudu na temelju koje bi Cabe mogao završiti u zatvoru, usmjeravaju nervoznu energiju na spašavanje psa koji je zapeo u cisterni.

programme.title: The Punisher
Punisher
programme.desc:
The Punisher: Directed by Jonathan Hensleigh. With A. Russell Andrews, Omar Avila, James Carpinello, Mark Collie. An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0330793/","name":"The Punisher","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NjcwMTQxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5ODkwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0330793/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AntiDot"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great movie for its genre","reviewBody":"I went to see this movie solely because Thomas Jane is in it, who is my latest celeb crush after seeing Stander. I don't read comics, and therefore knows nothing of the comicbook hero, The Punisher/Frank Castle. I didn't expect much, same as I wouldn't (and didn't) of movies like Batman, Catwoman, or The Hulk.

I was surprised at how much I enjoyed it. I was actually impressed! (Not easy to do) The dramatic and violent story was amazingly well balanced with the comedy and one-liners. The violence was not half as bad as I expected (although the one with the guillotine and the one with the knife through the chin at the end a bit unsettling...) And I appreciated being spared explicit lovescenes or a corny romance between Frank and Joan. Even the swearing was piped down considerably.

Of course, this is not Oscar material, but the acting was satisfying, and the story not bad at all. One to enjoy...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":154310,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2004-05-05","keywords":"vigilante,revenge,family reunion,female nudity,origin of hero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Punisher (2004)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4236444185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg1ZWIyNGQtMjdkNy00YjkzLWE3MDEtZWM0YjYxM2VlMmFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg1ZWIyNGQtMjdkNy00YjkzLWE3MDEtZWM0YjYxM2VlMmFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this film based on the Marvel comic book character"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005048/","name":"Thomas Jane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000526/","name":"Samantha Mathis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378144/","name":"Jonathan Hensleigh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092570/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378144/","name":"Jonathan Hensleigh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289833/","name":"Michael France"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom, specijalnom policijom koja se koristi nezakonitim metodama u borbi protiv kriminala, ali vrlo učinkovitim.

programme.title: Dobri liječnik
programme.desc: The Good Doctor serija je o mladom autističnom kirurgu koji se seli u San Jose kako bi počeo raditi u bolnici. Pratite zbivanja ovog mladog genijalca i njegovu svakodnevnicu! Američka serija The Good Doctor prikazuje život mladog kirurga Shauna Murphyja, autističnoga stručnjaka i genijalca koji ima malo drukčiji pogled od društva na sve oko njega. Seli se iz mjestašca u kojem je preživio teško djetinjstvo u San Jose kako bi radio u bolnici. Kako se snalazi na radnom mjestu i s kojim se sve situacijama susreće, pogledajte u ovoj uzbudljivoj seriji!

credits.actor: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Tamlyn Tomita, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Christina Chang, Paige Spara

programme.title: Totalcar
programme.desc: Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije! Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

Uz to, ekipa... Nakon što dokazi o ubojstvu mornaričkog kapetana dovedu do Duckyjeve pokojne majke, Ducky se prisjeća prošlosti i propituje ključnu životnu odluku koju je donio prije 37 godina. programme.title: Bad Boys
Zločesti dečki
programme.desc:
Bad Boys: Directed by Michael Bay. With Lisa Boyle, Michael Taliferro, Emmanuel Xuereb, Tchéky Karyo. Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112442/","name":"Bad Boys","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE1ZTQ0ZTEtZTEwZS00NWE0LTlmMDUtMTE1ZWJiZTYzZTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112442/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DHD99"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally, a successful marriage of comedy and action/thriller","reviewBody":"This high-action crime drama stands out for me because it succeeds at doing what other movies* have tried and, in my opinion, failed to do -- integrate genuinely funny comedy into the mix. The success is attributable partly to the comedic talents of Will Smith and Martin Lawrence -- who have the ability to deliver crude, rude dialog such that it's funny nevertheless -- and partly to a story that combines suspense and humor into a believable whole. 

 Our two heroes are police detectives Mike Lowry (Smith) and Marcus Burnett (Lawrence), who are a kind of tough-cop variation on The Odd Couple . Lowry is suave, slick, self-controlled, well-to-do, heroic, and a real ladies man. Burnett, on the other hand, is an ordinary guy who manages to stumble reasonably effectively, if somewhat ineptly, through his work and his married life.

So imagine what happens when Burnett has to convince a key witness, Julie (Téa Leoni) that he's Mike Lowry -- not just for a few hours, but for a few days. Furthermore, this is no pre-planned, well-orchestrated masquerade. A large stash of confiscated heroin has been un-confiscated right from police headquarters, and both the heroin and the perpetrator must be found within four days, or Internal Affairs is going to take some big-time disciplinary action. Lowry and Burnett are called in because they were the ones who captured the heroin in the first place, and because of the one trait they share -- a renegade approach to police work, which may not have their boss's approval, but which does get the job done (and at one point, causes a store owner to think they're out to rob him). The various twists and turns of the investigation lead to Lowry getting knocked out of commission at the same time that Julie witnesses a murder and refuses to deal with anybody but Mike Lowry. But Marcus Burnett is the only one available to deal with her, and since waiting for Lowry to recover isn't an option 

Subsequent events include Lowry's bachelor pad being invaded by Julie and her dogs, while Lowry stays with Burnett's wife, Burnett trying to keep his wife from finding out what's really going on, and Burnett and Lowry trying to find the heroin and keep Julie alive. 

For all you action movie fans, plenty of cars, plenty of buildings, and plenty of people get blown up along the way. (Looking over this review, I see that I've belied the high level of violence, which I definitely should warn you against.)

BAD BOYS kept me both amused and on the edge of my seat throughout. I'm afraid I did have two small complaints, however. First, I wish the resolution of the Burnett-pretending-to-be-Lowry story had been timed to coincide with the resolution of the main plot. 

As it is, the comic subplot ends, leaving the rest of the movie to proceed in a rather formulaic and pedantic fashion. Second, I wish more time had been spent on Lowry's problem of stepping into Burnett's shoes. The swinging bachelor having to play family man would have been good for a few laughs that we never got.

Aside from that, however, this is an action movie that stands out among the rest.

One final note concerning the DVD "Special Edition" release. BAD BOYS was a movie in which the music was particularly effective, and the DVD actually lets you listen to the music track by itself. I wish DVDs of other movies with great music had this option.

* Three examples that come to mind are 48 HOURS, KINDERGARTEN COP, and another Michael Bay film, ARMAGEDDON. 48 HOURS was grim enough to seriously stifle the humor, even with Eddie Murphy in the lead role. KINDERGARTEN COP made me laugh, but the crime drama felt like an unwelcome intrusion. In ARMAGEDDON, I felt the stakes were high enough that humor didn't seem appropriate."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":250065,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1995-04-07","keywords":"miami florida,buddy movie,criminal investigation,murder investigation,usa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bad Boys","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2344091929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001454/","name":"Martin Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102288/","name":"Lisa Boyle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303032/","name":"George Gallo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057398/","name":"Michael Barrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0611848/","name":"Jim Mulholland"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ultraviolet
Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Ultraviolet: Created by Wendy West. With Viet Anh Do, Marta Nieradkiewicz, Bartlomiej Topa, Magdalena Czerwinska. An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7514746/","name":"Ultraviolet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBhOGQyYmMtZTNhOS00MGRlLTljNTAtNDQ0ZGI5N2RjMWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7514746/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sdskate-66437"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great addition to crime drama series!!!","reviewBody":"I have to admit, I enjoy foreign crime series much better than American crime series. In my experience, in other countries the main characters are more developed, made to be experienced as more human and end up more likable than American crime drama series main characters. Ultraviolet is the first Polish tv series I have watched and, not only does it not disappoint, it has a refreshing POV on crime solving by using the amateur Internet sleuths. I LOVED IT!!! I sure hope Netflix offers us the 2nd season, and more!!!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1479,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime"],"datePublished":"2017-10-25","keywords":"technology","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9426329/","name":"Viet Anh Do"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2203849/","name":"Marta Nieradkiewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867603/","name":"Bartlomiej Topa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0668353/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0506795/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922388/","name":"Wendy West"}]}</script><metacontent="

An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7514746/","name":"Ultraviolet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBhOGQyYmMtZTNhOS00MGRlLTljNTAtNDQ0ZGI5N2RjMWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7514746/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sdskate-66437","dateCreated":"2018-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great addition to crime drama series!!!","reviewBody":"I have to admit, I enjoy foreign crime series much better than American crime series. programme.title: Noćna smjena
programme.desc: Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. U bolnici se doktori ne suočavaju samo s raznim bolestima i slučajevima, nego se i upoznavaju s novim romansama. Pratite uzbudljive trenutke ove serije i saznajte sve što se događa unutar tih bolničkih zidova!

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nakon što svjedoči pljački banke u svom gradiću, 45-godišnji razvedeni John Nolan pakira torbe i seli u Los Angeles odlučivši promijeniti život i postati policajac. Njegov dolazak među čuvare reda... Nakon što svjedoči pljački banke u svom gradiću, 45-godišnji razvedeni John Nolan pakira torbe i seli u Los Angeles odlučivši promijeniti život i postati policajac. Njegov dolazak među čuvare reda dočekan je s nevjericom među kolegama. U njegove sposobnosti posebice sumnjaju nadređeni Wade Gray i Taliom Bishop, zadužena za obuku i nadgledanje. Već prvi dan na poslu Nolan se mora se uhvatiti u koštac s obiteljskom svađom koja završi tragično.

programme.title: Noćna smjena
programme.desc: Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. U bolnici se doktori ne suočavaju samo s raznim bolestima i slučajevima, nego se i upoznavaju s novim romansama. Pratite uzbudljive trenutke ove serije i saznajte sve što se događa unutar tih bolničkih zidova!

programme.title: Noćna smjena

programme.title: The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet
Mali genijalac
programme.desc:
The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet: Directed by Jean-Pierre Jeunet. With Helena Bonham Carter, Judy Davis, Callum Keith Rennie, Kyle Catlett. A ten-year-old scientist secretly leaves his family's ranch in Montana where he lives with his cowboy father and scientist mother, escapes home, and travels across the country aboard a freight train to receive an award at the Smithsonian Institute." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1981107/","name":"The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3MDU1MTc5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk2NDY2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A ten-year-old scientist secretly leaves his family's ranch in Montana where he lives with his cowboy father and scientist mother, escapes home, and travels across the country aboard a freight train to receive an award at the Smithso","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1981107/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"in1984"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Award Deserving Story with or without 3D","reviewBody":"8.5 of 10. Genius kid invents a perpetual motion machine, goes on adventure. Simple but without a well-developed plot and quirky characters like the one Helena Bonham Carter plays (and continues to set her characters apart from every other actor on the planet), this would be heavily dependent on 3D to be worth viewing in theaters.

What starts out as seemingly just a nerd on the ranch family comedy, develops into a more complex tale. Then when it seems to have reduced to a road-trip, self-discovery story, it once again expands and delivers more.

The other key character in this is played by Judy Davis. There are, however, an ongoing stream of brilliant characters to provide fun and suspense in what really shouldn't be promoted as just 3D kid action.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-10-16","keywords":"fictional radio show,reference to david letterman,reference to wolfgang amadeus mozart,scientific experiment,death of twin brother","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4232817945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0MDM3OTk0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTU4MDY5MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0MDM3OTk0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTU4MDY5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"From Jean-Pierre Jeunet, visionary director of Amelie, comes an extraordinary 3D adventure about a gifted child with a passion for science."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000307/","name":"Helena Bonham Carter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001114/","name":"Judy Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719678/","name":"Callum Keith Rennie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000466/","name":"Jean-Pierre Jeunet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033266/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047606/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316131/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000466/","name":"Jean-Pierre Jeunet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491011/","name":"Guillaume Laurant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2916565/","name":"Reif Larsen"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vive la France
Živjela Francuska!
programme.desc: Vive la France: Directed by Michaël Youn. With José Garcia, Michaël Youn, Isabelle Funaro, Ary Abittan. Muzafar and Feruz are two good-hearted shepherds from Taboulistan... a tiny country in Central Asia that no one has ever heard of. In order to bring his country into the international limelight, the son of the Tabouli president decides to try terror "advertising" and entrusts the two shepherds, more naive than evil, with the mission of a lifetime: destroying the Eiffel Tower! To meet their objective, they have to move through the most hostile territory imaginable: France! A France far different from the West they had heard described: Corsican nationalists, over-zealous policemen, dishonest taxi drivers, violent sports fans, crabby employees, unfriendly waiters, Kafkaesque administrations and medical malpractice... they are spared nothing. Luckily they meet Marianne, a young and pretty reporter who mistakes them for illegal aliens and helps shows them another face of France... a hospitable, magnificent and generous land where the living is easy. Vive la France!" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2293138/","name":"Vive la France","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmZiYThiZjgtMzk4Mi00N2YxLWE0MmYtMDJlZjkxYjgzMmE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUyMTE3MTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Muzafar and Feruz are two good-hearted shepherds from Taboulistan... a tiny country in Central Asia that no one has ever heard of. In order to bring his country into the international limelight, the son of the Tabouli president decid","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2293138/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Look away","reviewBody":"If you want a sophisticated comedy, you are in the wrong place. Just as the french are in the wrong place, if you wanted France to be a beautiful country ... I'm just kidding of course and referring to something that the movie is trying to "tell" you! But if you are looking for a hidden message or a political agenda, you shouldn't bother. The movie just has fun with a lot of clichés.\n\nSome of them might not be too far away from the truth (it's like saying Germans enjoy beer and so forth ... obviously not every German is drinking beer, but the general view is there, so it's considered a fact, you can turn it around another way if you wanted) or as close to clichés as possible to make fun of them. This movie is making fun of everybody, but is also trying to be as lovely as possible. It still doesn't hold back and has some surprises along the way ... especially towards the end.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3857,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-02-20","keywords":"nude beach,topless female nudity,public nudity,eiffel tower,bare chested male","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Vive la France","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3946756633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjU0NWNhYzYtMjdiNy00ODdlLTlkNGUtMWI4MTYzNmM1MTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjU0NWNhYzYtMjdiNy00ODdlLTlkNGUtMWI4MTYzNmM1MTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Vive la France"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305296/","name":"José Garcia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949210/","name":"Michaël Youn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3730462/","name":"Isabelle Funaro"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949210/","name":"Michaël Youn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011185/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172053/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0306809/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949210/","name":"Michaël Youn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3951121/","name":"Dominique Gauriaud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1551369/","name":"Jurij Prette"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lichozrouti

programme.desc: Lichozrouti: Directed by Galina Miklínová. With Krystof Hádek, Jan Maxián, David Novotný, Ondrej Trojan. The Oddsockeaters are small creatures, who live alongside us humans and are responsible for socks that go missing when we only have one left from a pair - the odd sock. They eat socks, but only one from each pair." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5176632/","name":"Lichozrouti","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJiZWEzNGQtY2MzZi00MjBiLWJlMTEtOGJiNTQ4Njg4MjkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIxMzMyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Oddsockeaters are small creatures, who live alongside us humans and are responsible for socks that go missing when we only have one left from a pair - the odd sock. credits.actor: Jenna Fischer, Chris Messina, Malin Akerman, Rich Sommer, Lucy Punch, Topher Grace, Bob Odenkirk, Travis Schuldt

programme.title: Carbone
Carbone
programme.desc:
Carbone: Directed by Olivier Marchal. With Benoît Magimel, Gringe, Idir Chender, Laura Smet. Danger of losing his business, Anthony Roca, an ordinary man, develops a scam that will become the heist of the century. Overtaken by the crime, he will have to deal with betrayal, murder and settling." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6183834/","name":"Carbone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEyZjMwMTQtZmM5MS00NTZiLTk3NjEtNGI5ODdhOWM3ODkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzk2NTk3MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Danger of losing his business, Anthony Roca, an ordinary man, develops a scam that will become the heist of the century. Overtaken by the crime, he will have to deal with betrayal, murder and settling.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6183834/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RareMovieCritic"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good corruption/crime thriller","reviewBody":"This film is based on the 2008-09 carbon-quota scandal that occurred in France, but it's not a white-collar crime film like Wolf of Wall Street or anything of that sort that takes place mostly in offices, banks, courtrooms, etc.

It's more of a street crime film, where the world of street gangs intersects with financial crimes and fraud, along with legitimate businesses, dirty cops and clean ones.

It's an interesting film, but it tackles a subject too big and flies by too fast, making you doubt that some events took place during a week or a month. The sense of time is lost in editing. There's enough material here to make a mini-series (like Les Beaux Mecs, 2011... there are actually a lot of similarities with Les Beaux Mecs) but TV shows are not for everyone.

The production values are high, casting, etc. The only flaw I have with this movie is the editing. There was a scene at the start of the film that should not have been there. The passage of time was also not well shown. 

Other than that, I'd give it a 6.5 rounded up to a 7/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2313,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-11-01","keywords":"swindle,canal boat,trader,bank account,old mother","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi859944985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU4M2FlMDgtN2EwZi00NzQ1LTk3NTAtODBhZGNmMGZiMWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU4M2FlMDgtN2EwZi00NzQ1LTk3NTAtODBhZGNmMGZiMWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0536095/","name":"Benoît Magimel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6237589/","name":"Gringe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5478777/","name":"Idir Chender"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0545356/","name":"Olivier Marchal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136773/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048273/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0200136/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2486227/","name":"Emmanuel Naccache"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0545356/","name":"Olivier Marchal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9367128/","name":"Ali Hajdi"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Young Messiah
Mladi Mesija
programme.desc:
The Young Messiah: Directed by Cyrus Nowrasteh. With Adam Greaves-Neal, Sara Lazzaro, Vincent Walsh, Finn Ireland. Tells the story of Jesus Christ at age seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth. Told from his childhood perspective, it follows young Jesus as he grows into his religious identity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1002563/","name":"The Young Messiah","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NzM3NzczMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzM0NjkwNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tells the story of Jesus Christ at age seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth. Told from his childhood perspective, it follows young Jesus as he grows into his religious identity.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1002563/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"janthxciv"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A little latitude, please . . .","reviewBody":"Let's face it: no Gospel or historical source asserts, or even suggests, that Jesus met a character named Ben-Hur, gave him a drink of cold water and stared down a centurion who didn't appreciate it, cured Mom and Sister Hur of leprosy, and then paused on His way to the cross to receive a drink of cold water from Ben-Hur. Didn't happen folks; ain't in the Bible. But these fictional possibilities were woven together by Civil War general under his beech tree in Indiana, and in Sante Fe while he was governor of the New Mexico Territory where he offered amnesty to Billy the Kid, just like in Young Guns II. But when Lew Wallace presented his novel, BEN-HUR, to the world, it has not only been in print continuously, it has also inspired three films, at least; inspired President Garfield to appoint Wallace as Minister to the Ottoman Empire; gave its name to a sandwich sold in a diner in Crawfordville, IN, and also named a mutual burial insurance society, also in Crawfordsville. All that, and it was FICTIONAL, based upon what Lew Wallace thought was plausible.

The Young Messiah is exactly the same genre. It does not claim to be a Biblical explication, nor does it quietly pretend to be. It presents a fictional child of Jesus based upon plausibilities, accounts both Scriptural and outside the Bible, and a little bit of poetic vision thrown in. Same thing that Lew Wallace did in Ben Hur.

Yes we can quibble about details. I, too, believe that the Three Wise Men (whom I believe to be certain Roman notables, but I will not say who in this forum) arrived when Jesus was a toddler. But, shucks, Lew Wallace puts them in Bethlehem shortly after Jesus' birth, and two major films put them right next to the shepherds who also visited the stable---just like in the nativity figurines we purchase the day after Thanksgiving from better department stores. Not Biblically accurate---nope---but they still broadcast Charlton Heston as Ben Hur at Easter time. The same latitude should be granted to this movie. The Young Messiah film deserves to inherit the latitude established for it by its predecessors---Lew Wallace, Edward Bulwer-Lytton, Henryk Sienkiewicz, and even Par Lagerkvist. El Greco painted a crucifixion scene, but the city depicted behind Christ on the Cross was not Jerusalem but Toledo in Spain---now that's latitude---and it is considered a priceless masterpiece.

When I was a Junior in High School, my A. P. literature class was expected to read all of John Milton's epic poem, Paradise Lost, in three weeks. I wondered how such a long poem could be derived from such a slender account in the Biblical book of Genesis. Then I found out how: John Milton, with that great organ-like iambic pentameter, used some latitude; a whole lot of latitude, to create a magnificent poetic masterpiece. So, instead of quibling about exact details, as if this film were a lesson in Sunday School, let's receive it as a work of art intended in the same spirit as these other pieces of literature and art that I have cited.

I have been a Christian since 1994, and recently converted to the Eastern Orthodox Faith. My Orthodox faith is not disturbed by the film. I am only an amateur in film appreciation, although a published poet elsewhere, and I found the photography beautiful, the dialogue convincing, and the portrait of Jesus poignant, winsome, and a little bit fun (not like reading Kazantzakis' Last Temptation Of Christ). My faith is not so weak that an inaccuracy in the film will cause me to lose my spiritual balance. I just keep telling myself, "It's only a mpvie, only a movie." A very fine movie; at times, a very spiritual movie; and throughout, a very human movie. It deserves as much respect as our inaccurate Nativity scenes that we put up on the mantle, above the Christmas stockings hanging there, on Thanksgiving afternoon, after Grandma's fine Turkey with all the fixin's."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3420,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2016-03-11","keywords":"israel,jesus christ character,1st century,messiah,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2382672665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMjM4NDI0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ0NjU4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMjM4NDI0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ0NjU4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Jesus Christ at age seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6026206/","name":"Adam Greaves-Neal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909906/","name":"Vincent Walsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3322537/","name":"Sara Lazzaro"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637493/","name":"Cyrus Nowrasteh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043365/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232424/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637492/","name":"Betsy Giffen Nowrasteh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637493/","name":"Cyrus Nowrasteh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0723351/","name":"Anne Rice"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="
